item.title: Software-update
item.description: Software-update by mandlebro, l0rdc0mm4nd3r, majo and jofra General description This challenge has a service that accepts a zip file and if the signature inside is a valid RSA PSS signature of the Xor of the hash of the files and folders inside, it runs two python scripts. TLDR: since we can include an arbitrary number of files, we can find a set of 256 sha256 hashes which are a basis for $\mathbb{Z}_2^{256}$).
